data.text:
Mon

Mon is a city in Nagaland, in India.

GPS Coordinates of Mon, Nagaland, India

Mon is located on the latitude of 26.75 and longitude of 94.83333 and has a geohash of whg2jvxw0c2j.

Cities and Towns near Mon

The nearest significant population center from Mon is Nazira in Assam, India, located 20 kilometers or 12 miles ↖ NW of the city. Other locations in close proximity include Amguri (Assam, India) located 31 km (19 mi) ← W and Sibsagar (Assam, India) located 32 km (20 mi) ↖ NW of Mon.

In total, we found 23 cities near Mon in our database.

Power Plants near Mon

We found a total of 3 utility scale power plants in close proximity of Mon.
